name: Princess Escape (GameBoy Version)
description:
Princess Escape is a dynamic game boy game about princess escaping from a deadly castle that we all heard about in our childhood all by their self!

This game made for the #gbjam 2016 by the team of Silvio Lasmar, Jameson Pagini, Marco Henrique and Emiliandro Firmino. Special thanks to our UEA, our teachers Msc Cristina Araujo, Msc Adriano Gil and Msc Raphel Maquiné, our colleague Pedro Ferreira and to Letícia Misna de Menezes.
